messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
messages.content: 2010 - 2015: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain, Given an £800 tax cut to low and middle income workers, Campaigned hard to keep Scotland strong as part of the UK, Delivered the largest ever increase in the state pension. 2015 - 2020: Finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly, Cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers, Devolve more powers to Scotland, and rebalance the economy away from London, Decent pension rises every year through our 'triple lock'

messages.title: 3 great reasons to vote for Amanda Kubie
messages.content: Will cut income tax for people in Dumfriesshire, Clydesdale and Tweeddale by another £400, Will change the law so that the state pension always rises higher than earnings or inflation every year, The Liberal Democrats will increase health spending across the UK which means £800m more for Scotland

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain, finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly, cut Income Tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Campaign to keep Scotland strong as part of the UK, devolve more powers to Scotland, and rebalance the economy away from London.
Increase health spending across the UK which means £800m more for Scotland.
Delivered the largest ever increase in the state pension, change the law so that the state pension always rises higher than earnings or inflation every year through our 'triple lock'.

issues.economy: Cut the deficit by half, reducing borrowing by £3,000 for every household in Britain, finish the job of balancing the books, on time and fairly.
issues.governance: Campaign to keep Scotland strong as part of the UK, devolve more powers to Scotland, and rebalance the economy away from London.
issues.health: Increase health spending across the UK which means £800m more for Scotland.
issues.socialWelfare: Delivered the largest ever increase in the state pension, change the law so that the state pension always rises higher than earnings or inflation every year through our 'triple lock'.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet encourages supporters to help Amanda Kubie by joining her campaign, displaying a window poster, helping with leaflets, or providing clerical assistance either at home or in the office.
